title: NFL Hits 100 With a Slew of Big-Money Story Lines
itunes:title: NFL Hits 100 With a Slew of Big-Money Story Lines
description:
Scott Soshnick, Eben Novy-Williams and Michael Barr in a special Labor Day edition of the Bloomberg Business of Sports podcast discuss a host of issues related to the industry, including the bevy of business story lines that accompany the NFL as it opens and new season and celebrates its 100th birthday. Among them are: Andrew Luck’s retirement, Rob Gronkowski and Terrell Davis’s CBD deals and Tony Romo’s desire to be the first $10 million TV man. Also discussed are the Yankees buyback of the YES Network along with Sinclair and Amazon, the changes in the college sports landscape, including the Pac-12 media sale and the growth of legalized sports betting in the U.S. 

Hosts: Scott Soshnick, Eben Novy-Williams and Michael Barr

Producer: Colin Tipton

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
